To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private UpDownGapThreeMethods _updowngapthreemethods;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_updowngapthreemethods = UpDownGapThreeMethods(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_updowngapthreemethods.IsReady)
{
    var period = _updowngapthreemethods.Period.Value;
    var current = _updowngapthreemethods.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.updowngapthreemethods = self.UpDownGapThreeMethods(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.updowngapthreemethods.IsReady:
    period = self.updowngapthreemethods.Period.Value
    current = self.updowngapthreemethods.Current.Value
